title: Practical Problem-Solving Process for Social Issues Using a Smart Education Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and experience in analyzing social issues
context.additional_context: Corporate practitioners' program to acquire on-site social problem-solving competencies via a smart education framework, emphasizing smartphone-based tools and project collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply the three-tier architecture of smart education frameworks to practical cases
Learners can analyze social issues and design solutions using smartphone-based tools
Learners can present and receive evaluations on outcomes of applying smart education approaches through team-based projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
